CustomField.description: Stores the API names of additional fields from the Contact object in the Billings, Capacity, Utilization, and Utilization Results datasets in the PS Cloud Core Analytics app.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Stores the API names of additional fields from the Contact object in the Billings, Capacity, Utilization, and Utilization Results datasets in the PS Cloud Core Analytics app.
CustomField.label: Additional Contact Field API Names
